articles.title: Home of the week: Updated Newton condo near Green Line for under $700K
articles.description:
This three-unit building was created out of a home built in 1910.

The post Home of the week: Updated Newton condo near Green Line for under $700K appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Updated Newton condo listed for under $700K, appealing to first-time homebuyers.
Condo located near the Green Line, enhancing public transportation access for residents.
Building dates back to 1910, offering historical charm in a modern living space.
